BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_CRCHK_TRN(STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_VERIFIED_BY_AAO,STR_VEIFIED_BY,DT_VERIFICATION_DATE,STR_REMARKS ,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,GNUM_ISVALID ,GNUM_SEAT_ID,gnum_hospital_code,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO ) (SELECT T.STR_CHALLAN_NO,T.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,T.STR_VERIFIED_BY_AAO,T.STR_VEIFIED_BY,T.DT_VERIFICATION_DATE,T.STR_REMARKS ,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,T.GNUM_ISVALID ,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.gnum_hospital_code,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_CRCHK_TRN A where A.STR_CHALLAN_NO=T.STR_CHALLAN_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTCAS_CHAL_CRCHK_TRN T WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_CRCHK_TRN X SET X.STR_VERIFIED_BY_AAO=?,X.STR_VEIFIED_BY=?,X.DT_VERIFICATION_DATE=?,X.STR_REMARKS=? ,X.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,X.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE X.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND X.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS =? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_ONLINE_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_REJ_CORR_TRN T SET T.STR_REJECTED_STATUS=?,T.DT_REJECTED_DATE=?,T.STR_REJECTED_BY=?,T.STR_REJECTED_REMARKS=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? and T.gnum_hospital_code=?
